description: C3PO is Python module responsible for converting all .po files from locale directory into one .odsfile and sending it to the Google Docs (spreadsheet link provided by user), so users with access to that spreadsheetcan translate expression included there.This module provides Communicator which deals with uploading, downloading these translations and synchroniing wholecontent by merging it. Package contains basic methods for converting po files into csv, ods formats and back. It alsoprovides methods for git push and git checkout po files into repository.
longdescription: C3PO is Python module responsible for converting all .po files from locale directory into one .odsfile and sending it to the Google Docs (spreadsheet link provided by user), so users with access to that spreadsheetcan translate expression included there.This module provides Communicator which deals with uploading, downloading these translations and synchroniing wholecontent by merging it. Package contains basic methods for converting po files into csv, ods formats and back. It alsoprovides methods for git push and git checkout po files into repository.
